pages.text: Shiba Inus were originally bred for hunting small game.$(br2)Standing at just over half a block tall, these feisty dogs come in four different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in jungles. They can also be found in old growth taigas, and more rarely in normal taigas.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Chicken or Rabbit Treat.
